question:
Consider the following statements about the Convention on Migratory Species (CMS):
  1. It is an international treaty, concluded under the aegis of the World Wildlife Fund
  2. India is a party to the convention
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: The Convention on Migratory Species (CMS) or the Bonn Convention is an international treaty, concluded under the aegis of the United Nations Environment Programme, concerned with the conservation of wildlife and habitats on a global scale. India became a party to the convention in 1983. Recently, it was announced that India will host the next United Nations (UN) global wildlife conference or CMS Conference of the Parties CMSCOP13 in 2020. The CMS COP is held once in three years.
